Author: gotprobsyo
Text: I’ve been stuck in relapse before. Unfortunately no matter the degree of exercise I do I still feel disgustingly overweight. I felt that way even when I was underweight. It’s a tough road.

Author: many_mishaps_melly
Text: Try really really hard not to. Remember it's not actually weight based for the most part, it's a mental health nightmare and a war with your own brain.  If you're in it it's really isolating, not at all healthy and effects everything from relationships to work life to general fitness and health.   If you feel over weight, that's ok. Maybe change up your exercise routine and make a healthy meal plan. Do something new for your health and after a while you'll gain confidence in yourself and feel proud for the healthy change.   It's a dark pit down here in relapse and I want out.   (Love your username btw!)
